definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: Then the nail must be straightened before it can be hammered into place correctly.
sentences.chinese: 于是在把钉子正确地钉入之前，需要先弄直它。

sentences.english: Then I became an imaginary enemy to myself.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我成了我自己的假想敌。

sentences.english: I shook my head reprovingly, and then she blushed and whispered.
sentences.chinese: 我不以为然地摇摇头，于是她脸红了，小声说。
于是，基里洛夫牺牲了自己。

sentences.english: So the Giant built a high wall all round the garden.
sentences.chinese: 于是巨人在花园周围筑起一堵高高的墙。

sentences.english: Pinocchio was not able to walk, therefore, the boss sold him to an old drummer.
sentences.chinese: 木偶行唔到，于是老板就卖左比个老鼓手。

sentences.english: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim;
sentences.chinese: 于是，何西阿去娶了滴拉音的女儿歌篾。

sentences.english: And then, Hu Yin comes here every evening.
sentences.chinese: 于是，胡公子每天晚上都来。

sentences.english: So they moved the ark of the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 于是将以色列神的约柜运到那里去。

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人于是就收敛起自己恶的一面，于是就积善行德。

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人于是就收敛起自己恶的一面，于是就积善行德。

sentences.english: Yesterday I made mistakes, then I correct them today and warn myself not to mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我犯错了，于是我今天改过并告诫自己不可重犯。

sentences.english: The sexton therefore took him into his house, and he had to ring the church bell.
sentences.chinese: 于是司事就将老二带走了，让他在教堂敲钟。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor qunosity products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 于是多量浙江一带产的劣质产品起初进入市场。

sentences.english: Then, he begins to degenerate, indulge woman's charms.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他开始堕落，沉迷女色。

sentences.english: Rarr; So I chaffed them because I didn't believe their words.
sentences.chinese: 于是我揶揄他们因为我不相信他们的话。

definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
